text: This is a list of Colombian billionaires based on an annual assessment of wealth and assets compiled and published by Forbes magazine in 2019. == 2019 Colombian billionaires list == {| class="wikitable" !World Rank !Name !Citizenship !Net worth (USD) !Source of wealth |- |129 |Luis Carlos Sarmiento | |10.8 billion |banking |- |597 |Jaime Gilinski Bacal | |3.6 billion |banking |- |838 |Carlos Ardila Lülle | |1.5 billion |soft drinks, diversified |- |} ==See also== * The World's Billionaires * List of countries by the number of billionaires ==References== Colombian Net worth Billionaires
title: List of Colombian people by net worth
